empty.hint: It looks like you don't have any seatmaps. Click the button below to create your first seatmap.

area.description: Select the name of the seatmap, sectors, seat order and rows
area.label: Arena settings

upload.description: Files with the seatmap will be imported into the editor
upload.label: Upload files

upload.description: Upload your seating map SVG file to begin. Make sure your SVG contains proper group elements and seat circles.
upload.heading: Upload seatmap

hintDrawer.description: To ensure your SVG works properly with our seatmap generator, please follow this structure:

structure.rootGroup: • Start with a root group that contains everything
structure.rowGroup: • Add row groups inside each sector group
structure.seatGroups: • Create individual seat groups inside each row
structure.seatShapes: • Add seat shape elements (circles) inside each seat group with proper coordinates (cx, cy) and radius (r)
structure.sectorGroup: • Create groups for each seating sector/area
structure.sectorShape: • Add the sector background shape (path) inside each sector group
structure.title: SVG Structure Requirements

tips.coordinates: • Each seat circle must have cx, cy coordinates and r radius attributes
tips.export: • Export from design software with proper group structure preserved
tips.hierarchy: • Follow this hierarchy: Root Group → Sector Group → (Sector Shape + Row Groups) → Seat Groups → Seat Shapes
tips.naming: • Use any ID names you prefer, but keep them unique and descriptive
tips.organization: • Keep sector shapes and row groups as siblings within sector groups
tips.title: Design Tips

hintDrawer.title: SVG Structure Guide for Designers
